title: Businessweek Extra - House of Gucci
itunes:title: Businessweek Extra - House of Gucci
description:
Hosted by Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec

Featuring a conversation with Bloomberg's Sara Forden, whose book inspired the new 'House of Gucci' movie ... and who recently uncovered a new twist in the murder drama.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
